VIII.iv.4.A.11.c
.
Establishing Entitlement to A&A at the (l) Rate Prior to Rating for SMC (t)
Before considering entitlement to SMC (t), the rating activity must establish entitlement to A&A benefits at the (l) rate.
Reference
:  For more information on the procedures governing awards for SMC (l) for A&A, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, 4.A.8
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 4, Section A - Special Monthly Compensation (SMC)
